#summary Adds a child at the end of current node's children

===== =====
==Description==
_SXE_ *appendChild* ( _SimpleXMLElement_ $new )

This function appends a child to an existing list of children or creates a new list of children.

===== =====
==Parameters==

_new_

 The appended child

===== =====
==Return Values==

The node added.

===== =====
==Errors/Exceptions==
This function throws [http://php.net/manual/ref.dom.php#dom.class.domexception DOMException]

===== =====
==Example==

{{{
$root = new SXE(
'<root>
	<child />
</root>'
);
$new = new SXE('<grandchild />');

$root->child->appendChild($new);
echo $root->asXML();
}}}
will output
{{{
<root>
	<child><grandchild /></child>
</root>
}}}
